column1: What is a business Badge? How can a Badge assigned to my business be useful for it?
column2: Assigning of a Badge to your business can enhance the identity of your business. The associated badge is displayed on your business in an attractive manner along with its title and description. As Badges are used to specifically mark businesses on this community, they can also be used to help users in better identifying the type of businesses they are looking for. From the search form for businesses, users can easily do a quick filtering to see businesses belonging to a particular Badge.

column1: How can I get a Badge for my business?
column2:
Badges are assigned to businesses by our site administrators. Depending on the Package chosen by you for your business, you will be able to request for a particular Badge to be assigned to your business from the “Badge” section in your business Dashboard. Your request for the Badge for your business will be sent to our site administrators. Your business can also be assigned a Badge different from the one requested by you.
Our site administrators can assign a Badge to your business, even if you have not requested for one.

column1: Can I have more than one Badge for my business?
column2: No, only one Badge can be assigned to your business at a time. If your business already has a badge assigned, then you can request for a new Badge and if our site administrators approves it, then your previous Badge will be replaced with the new Badge.
